user_query: I want to learn more about the history of movies. Can you provide me with a random movie from the top 100 movies list? Additionally, recommend a novel that explores the behind-the-scenes of the movie industry. Finally, show me the cover image of the novel.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random movie from the top 100 movies list.
Recommend a novel that explores the behind-the-scenes of the movie industry.
Retrieve and display the cover image of the recommended novel.
